name: Sugar
text: Activate: Main You may rest 1 of your DON!! and this character: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the (Donquixote Pirates) type and add it to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the (Donquixote Pirates) type and add it to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
